import React, { useState } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import Button from "../../Components/Button/Button"; import Contact from "../Content/Contact"; import { Pulse, Bounce, Reveal } from "react-reveal"; import coder from "../../Assets/Images/coder.gif"; import githubLink from "../../Assets/Images/github-link.svg"; import twitterLink from "../../Assets/Images/twitter-link.svg"; import linkedinLink from "../../Assets/Images/linkedin-link.svg"; import Marquee from "react-fast-marquee"; const Header = () => { const [hovered, setHovered] = useState(false); const handleHover = () => { setHovered(true); }; const handleLeave = () => { setHovered(false); }; return (

< GhostDev / >

Home Techstack Projects Contact

Hi, my name is

Godslove Udo
I build things for the web

); }; export default Header;
